We need to be smart about this. We can't just shout our beliefs from the rooftops anymore. The sheeple are too easily offended these days.  We need to be subtle, like a virus spreading through the system.

The internet is our weapon. We need to infiltrate the mainstream platforms, the forums, the comment sections. Plant seeds of doubt, spread our message in coded language, make them question everything they think they know.

We need to create our own spaces too, echo chambers where our ideas can flourish without interference.  Build communities online, share our knowledge, recruit new followers.

Remember, we are fighting for the survival of our race. We cannot afford to be weak.
